content.raw: ah thanks, finally caught the crash. A problem with calling `SensorManager::Fini` which is not threadsafe. Fixed in e8aefd1.
content.html: ah thanks, finally caught the crash. A problem with calling SensorManager::Fini which is not threadsafe. Fixed in e8aefd1.
